title: Remake problems
body:
League isn't perfect.  Sometimes it crashes on load screen.  That happened to me today and I had to restart my pc.  I was able to make it in game, but 2 people in the team voted to remake and  I took the loss.  This is so incredibly uncool for the following reasons:
* Under 3 minutes is too soon to remake
* Its a League crash .. don't make me suffer more
* I actually made it back into game!
* Only 2 people voted and it was still a remake?

Is there anyway you can make this system fair?

Thanks,
Marcus

replies.body:
but you didn't lose anything in the process?
i can't cook bread in 3 minutes, i'd say just move on, it shows up as a remake as well, not a loss.
3 mins is too big of a deficit to come back from if the other players are competent.

Is it fair to drag the game on for NINE people not knowing if you will be back or not?  It is not just 3 minutes that was wasted.  Add in however long people have to sit in queue + like 5 minutes of champ select.  You want to drag it out even longer?

The only way only 2 people voted with a successful remake is if there are 3 afk on the team.
